title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1105.4 - Examination content: State specific questions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1105.4 - Examination content: State specific questions

State Regulations

Real property appraiser licensing and certification
examinations offered by approved examination administrators shall also include

State specific questions as prescribed by the department to examine knowledge
and understanding of New York Appraisal Law, rules and
regulations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
1105.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
